ckQuat ckQuat::slerp ( const ckQuat &  to,
r32  ratio 
) const

Returns a ckQuat which is interpolated between this ckQuat and an another ckQuat by the specified ratio, using spherical linear interpolation.

Parameters:
[in] to An another ckQuat.
[in] ratio The value which indicates how far to interpolate between two ckQuats. This value is clamped between 0.0f and 1.0f.
Returns:
A ckQuat which is interpolated between two ckQuats.

Returns:

static ckQuat ckQuat::fromMat ( const ckMat &  mat  )  [static]

Returns a ckQuat which is converted from the specified ckMat.

Parameters:

Returns:
